capins 0.0.1.91
  • Reference

file

Source: R/file.R
capin.Rd

file

capin(x)

Arguments

x

(character) a file path

Examples

# a file that's already on the web
x <- system.file("extdata", "vostok.icecore.co2", package = "contentid")
capin(x)

#> [1] "hash://sha256/9412325831dab22aeebdd674b6eb53ba6b7bdd04bb99a4dbb21ddff646287e37"
url <- 'https://cdiac.ess-dive.lbl.gov/ftp/trends/co2/vostok.icecore.co2'
capin(url)

#> [1] "hash://sha256/9412325831dab22aeebdd674b6eb53ba6b7bdd04bb99a4dbb21ddff646287e37"

# a file not on the web
w <- tempfile(fileext=".csv")
df <- data.frame(a = letters, b = LETTERS)
write.csv(df, file = w)
res <- capin(w)
res

#> [1] "hash://sha256/962879c5f01b0d94e706a99387a87e464e36805580f0c4eb4b830960e7f46392"
contentid::query_sources(res)

#>                                                                             source
#> 1 /var/folders/24/8k48jl6d249_n_qfxwsl6xvm0000gn/T//RtmpBszL7l/file775635f0493.csv
#>                  date
#> 1 2021-02-12 21:09:44
